The 1998 Multishow Brazilian Music Awards () or simply 1998 Multishow Awards () was held on 27 May 1998, at the Canecão in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. Toni Garrido and Alessandra Calor hosted the ceremony.
Winners and nominees
Nominees for each award are listed below; winners are listed first and highlighted in boldface.
